survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of employees who have participated in corporate training programs, with the goal of improving future training initiatives.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the corporate training programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio button question. Randomize answer options to reduce bias.
